website_summaries.verdict: Great for short trips and easy to store, but larger riders may be disappointed with sluggish performance.
pros: Room on the frame for a few accessory attachments
Collapses for easy storage or public transport
USB port charges devices while you ride
cons: Rough ride due to limited suspension
Riders 200+ pounds may not get the same distance and speed

website_summaries.verdict: Some may find the Swagtron's 10 mile, 10 mph range a little limiting, but satisfied owners praise its compact size and ease of use. Ideal for short commutes to work, local stores, or the park.
pros: Includes a USB port for charging electronic devices
High weight capacity for its size
cons: Tires wear out quickly, difficult to replace

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my swag cycle
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my swag cycle! It’s so efficient and fun! However, here i am at the 6 month mark and it won’t charge. How is that for a great product? I’m so disappointed that i spent so much money on it to have it break 6 months later.
customer_reviews.author: eryn

customer_reviews.title: It seems cool at first but literally let it charge overnight the ...
customer_reviews.text: It seems cool at first but literally let it charge overnight the battery depleted within 2 miles and I had to push the rest the way. It’s compact and it looks cool but it should be more maybe like $75 not $406 after tax.
customer_reviews.author: SOME NAME

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Have had this about 2 months and love it. We have a motor home and take this to get around. I added a little basket, everyone who sees this loves it. No issues so far, easy to ride light weight enough to pick up and put in the motor home.
customer_reviews.author: joy lonardo

customer_reviews.title: There's no rear view mirror but a $7 accessory from Amazon took care of that easily enough! At $400
customer_reviews.text: Virtually no assembly required. Just charge it out of the box and get on it and take it for a spin! Doesn't go uphill worth a darn but I am at the higher end of the rated load max so that's to be expected. Gong up our driveway, I have to help it with my feet on the ground. The horn is a bit anemic but that's a not a big deal. Lights fore/aft are more than adequate. There's no rear view mirror but a $7 accessory from Amazon took care of that easily enough! At $400, it's the lowest cost eBike available. It's well designed and build quality is excellent. Jim
customer_reviews.author: J. Quon

customer_reviews.title: Cool bike. It gets you around
customer_reviews.text: Cool bike. It gets you around, but people will not leave you alone. One woman even chased me into my apartment building to ask me about the bike! My advice is to make some small cards with the brand name and website on them and hand it to people when they start bugging you. They should get the hint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NYC Beast
customer_reviews.text: This cycle is part of my family now. I cherish it so much. Here's my commute. I travel from 55th and 11ave NYC to Long island city. It gets a little slow up big hills like the Queen'sborough bridge but it is still cruising. UPDATE Wish they had upgrades by now..i still ride all day...ride so much I grinded down the brakes...i rode it in snow..heavy rain..i don't care i have been riding it everyday since I got it. BEWARE DOn't lean toward bike is a little front heavy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little machine
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little machine. My wife loves it. She gets so many people asking her where she got it and that they want one too. I have an 6 speed/ electric bike but she is not comfortable riding it or any bike for that matter but she’s totally comfortable and confident when she rides the swag. Great product. Exceptional quality and cool looking too. You can’t go wrong with this machine for your wife or daughter or whomever wants to ride but doesn’t want anything bulky or to heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: FAULTY BRAKES
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with its rear disc brakes not probably calibrated and seemed faulty. I took it to the bike shop and its still does not want to work. When i called the manufacturer, they really did not seem to care. This seems like a refurbished defective unit, or its just a Piece of Crap.
customer_reviews.author: Amran Shah

customer_reviews.title: great e-bike
customer_reviews.text: I am using crutches and putting no weight on my right leg. this bike helps me move around inside my big office building. it also weighs reasonable to carry around easily. (future improvements could be if training wheels can be installed for better balance for people like me. it could be a good idea to use same size wheels front and back. I also wonder if foot supports can be placed in the center and if the bike can be little longer with adjustable seat and handles.
customer_reviews.author: firtina81

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in 10 months!!!
customer_reviews.text: Died in 10 months!! For $400 that’s horrible. Charged perfectly on timer after use. Stored inside of course. Started not working when turned handle bar. Then stopped working altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Electric Vehicle for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Great lil scooter. Ya, it's not the fastest and it doesn't have the most range in its class. But I'm a 210 pound man and this lil scooter can carry me up moderate hills and it can even carrie me on grass and dirt! Amazing deal for a last mile/arrand running electric vehicle. I bought 2
customer_reviews.author: ILikeBigStuffAndICanNotLie

customer_reviews.title: Life's best purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!! This is an AMAZING bike with lots of strength, battery life & fun!! I couldn't have made a better purchase. I love this thing and totally recommend it!! It's used for work and happy to have this handy helper around. I should be purchasing 2 more soon!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper 😊

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase. Look elsewhere for an E-Bike
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. My brother, best friend, and I all bought the same matching bikes and all three were broken upon opening and first use. Mine would not charge out of box and the other two basically fell apart within the first three uses. Horrible waste of money and customer support.
customer_reviews.author: gel

customer_reviews.title: This is the best portable ebike on market
customer_reviews.text: Did an extensive research before order this E-bike, and don't want to spend more than $500. So far i'm happy and would recommend to everyone. Bike arrive within two days, well package with two corrugated boxes, includes instruction and foot stands, UL charger. Setup is breeze, bike can fold and unfold within few sec. light weight, very easy to put in trunk.
customer_reviews.author: furno 0131

customer_reviews.title: Fun Cycle
customer_reviews.text: So much fun for an aging use to be bike rider! I miss the freedom of riding and took this for a 1st spin today! What fun! Just the right speed to keep me safe and allow me to enjoy being on the go without a car! Seat not comfortable so will replace. Use is just tooling around with no specific destination!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Carbajal

customer_reviews.title: Back tire malfunction
customer_reviews.text: Like the distance of the battery for the price of it all. When I recieved the bike it had a flat rear tire which had a cost. So the discount wasn't worth it. Rode it for another 50 mt. Had to replace back tire again. Looking for a replacement wheel that will run for some miles please and thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D. Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for short commutes. Lots of great features for such a small bike.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Williams

customer_reviews.title: This thing is so fun. A little strange having the foot pegs on ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so fun. A little strange having the foot pegs on the front wheel but other than that love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce W

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my SwagCycle it is so fun to ride. I bought this on a whim when I broke up with my partner and I was not disappointed. Everyone that has ridden it has fallen in love with it. I can take it to work and store it under my desk, it can make it up most hills and the battery last a lot longer than one would think.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for our motorhome
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for our motorhome !! They are a blast . . . very light and cost effective. Even bought 2 !!
customer_reviews.author: VtaGrandma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I feel very satisfied, and also I took new gadget that you see basket. 😊😉
customer_reviews.author: Onur

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as a really fun 40th birthday gift and it is exactly that!! So so so much fun!! Love it and 10mph doesn’t sound like much but it feels so much faster!! I’m requesting one for myself so we can take them down the shore
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of the product. Manufacturing defect of rear rim causes tire to pinch and pop tube. Not sure if this is a common problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amy  Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am in LOVE! Bought this to take on RV-Can’t wait to swag around the campground!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine V. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Great street bike... but not on dirt/sandy roads
customer_reviews.text: Bought this about 3-4wks ago and everyone in the family loves it! I might have to buy a second one. I wish they had more colors to choose from, but overall a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Yessi Baca

customer_reviews.title: I love this bike
customer_reviews.text: I'm disabled so getting around can be tough. I love this bike. I bought it in May of this year and must say it's a blast. I take it everywhere. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Karla Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great little e bike. Easy to use in right spaces. Light weight and fits in the trunk of most cars
customer_reviews.author: Njbarr711

customer_reviews.title: It is fun to ride
customer_reviews.text: Dislike how the back tire is always going flat. Dislike how the battery doesn't hold a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The best product in the market for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We bought two of these and plan on buying two ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these and plan on buying two more VERY soon! They exceeded our expectations and function flawlessly as they should. My son and I have already had numerous Seagcycle adventures and use them daily for grocery store and Starbucks runs. 😜
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 9y/o son Loves!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My 9 y/o loves this bike. So easy to pack away for trips.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: ... got it today May 19 and wow I freaking love it wow it's awesome no words to describe the ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today May 19 and wow I freaking love it wow it's awesome no words to describe the experience I had took it outside and bang wow amazing nice smooth I got the white one you guys have to buy it I repeat you guys have to but thus bike it's so nice wow omg!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jerson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love it the best thing I bought this year I LOVE it thank you swagcycle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good by works well and will work well in the ...
customer_reviews.text: good by works well and will work well in the pits
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Rear tire popped 3 times in 2 weeks. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy but I was unable to ride it
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy but I was unable to ride it. I do not have the balance or agility to ride it safely at 72.
customer_reviews.author: Medvive Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the cycle
customer_reviews.text: I like the cycle. Light, compact. Riding tip: put at least one foot on pegs before excelerating or the front end may pop up. My problem with it is a) the lack of a battery replacement and b) how cagey the company is about the battery life. They refuse to answer what the average lifespan is, which is problematic. If I have to throw this thing away after 6 month, what a huge waste of money and materials. And that's why I'm only giving it two stars right now.
customer_reviews.author: InXanadu

customer_reviews.title: good for kids
customer_reviews.text: cant go up hills good takes the power out of it
customer_reviews.author: gilibert

customer_reviews.title: So fun and functional
customer_reviews.text: So fun, only negative is the wire placement for brake wire, when you turn sometimes inadvertently squeezes brake. Overall I love it and yea you look silly but who cares! It's perfect for short commutes and folds up nicely for storage once you get to work.
customer_reviews.author: SP

product_meta.title: SWAGTRON SwagCycle E-Bike – Folding Electric Bicycle with 10 Mile Range, Collapsible Frame, and Handlebar Display (White)
product_meta.description:
Sexy meets sleek with the new SWAGTRON Swagcycle. The SWAGTRON SwagCycle is an affordable, compact, zero emissions, personal transportation device that looks like a bicycle but rides like a motorcycle. The SwagCycle electric motorbike uses a high-capacity 36v lithium-ion battery that’ll help you make your way to class, journey from the subway to work, or even just ride through your neighborhood while recharging in as little as 2.5 hours. 

Feel the wind in your hair, and the Swagcycle below your feet as you and your friends ride Swagcycle electric bicycles on adventures all through the city, whether it be through bike paths, parks, or city sidewalks. 

Whether you’re a young adventurer, college student or a commuting adult, the SwagCycle motor bicycle combines the best of both worlds. The 29 lb aerospace grade aluminum frame folds for convenient storage and portability and can support up to 264 lbs. From the handle bars you can accelerate, brake, check the status of the battery, turn on the headlight, and even honk the horn. 

Push the Swagcycle to its 10 MPH limit on the hill and zip past other bikers struggling to pedal, or dash through city streets as you effortlessly fly past all the other cars stuck in traffic. 

The SwagCycle e-cycle was designed for the modern commuter and comes equipped with a USB outlet to charge your electronic devices, so you always have energy wherever you go. The SwagCycle power bike can help you navigate through traffic, cut down on your commute, and save your money. 

Each SwagCycle is covered by a 1-year limited warranty from SWAGTRON. 

Cool. Sexy. Effortless. That’s SwagCycle. Order your SwagCycle today!
feature_bullets: 10 MPH & 10 MILE RANGE - The motorized bicycle uses a 36v battery & a 250-watt motor that charges in 2.5 hours.
COLLAPSES FOR EASY STORAGE - The folding bike uses an aerospace grade aluminum frame & easily fits in trunks of all sizes.
HANDLEBAR DISPLAY – Check battery life, turn on the headlight, honk the horn, accelerate, and brake all from the handlebars.
CHARGE YOUR DEVICES ON THE GO – A micro USB charging port enables you to charge your devices while you ride.
ZERO EMISSIONS – The eco-friendly SwagCycle is 100% electric and emissions free, saving both your wallet and the environment.
